alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 07 at 11:36PM CDT until June 08 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT THURSDAY FOR DAWSON, EASTERN GAINES AND MARTIN COUNTIES... At 1136 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Midland, Lamesa, Stanton, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Lenorah, Welch, Los Ybanez, Patricia, Klondike, Tenmile, Sparenberg, Tarzan, Arvana, Key, Punkin Center, Hancock, McKenzie Lake, Courtney and Stanton Municipal Aiport. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
